title: Faculty Advisor
name: Dr. Matthew Valenti
blurb: Dr. Valenti has been a part of the radio club for over 25 years and has expertise in numerous RF systems.
bio: Dr. Valenti has been a part of the radio club since the early 1990's. He has served in numerous roles within the Lane Department of Computer Science & Electrical Engineering, and also has great expertise in cellular & Wi-Fi systems.

title: President
name: Aidan Kern
blurb: Aidan holds a General Class License and has been with the club since 2022.
bio: Aidan is a 3rd-Generation Ham, where his Dad, Grandma, and Grandpa are all licensed! He currently holds a General Class License. He is a commuter student and is involved in many fields both on and off campus, including playing saxophone for the Pride of West Virginia and acting as the Student Engineer for the University radio station, U92.

title: Secretary of Defense
name: Trogdor
blurb: He never sleeps, the judge. He is dancing, dancing. He says that he will never die.
